attributes.action: Ban the sale of strong cheap cider/beer.....age ban is not enough!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ban the sale of very strong cheap(LETHAL)cider/beer in stores.Age ban is not enough.Killing the less fortunate who reduce themselves into drinking this poison.Kids of single parents and problem families,causing more problems in less well off areas.Whats more,its not sold in wealthy towns.Its plain to see whats happening here....SIGN THIS PETITION

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
